com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model

Interface Rule<T,U>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuditableRule, GoldenRule, RuleAdapter

    public interface Rule<T,U>
    The Rule interface used for specifying Rules that can be grouped together to create RuleBooks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      • invoke

        default boolean invoke()
        Invokes the Rule; defaults to calling invoke(facts) using the facts assigned to the Rule.
        Returns:
        true if the the action(s) were executed, otherwise false

      • invoke

        boolean invoke(NameValueReferableMap facts)
        Invokes the Rule using the given facts in place of the facts assigned to the Rule.
        Parameters:
        facts - the facts to be used in the invocation of the Rule
        Returns:
        true if the action(s) were executed, otherwise false
